rows.translation: In the name of Allah, most benevolent, ever-merciful.
ALL PRAISE BE to Allah, Lord of all the worlds,
King of the Day of Judgement.
You alone we worship, and to You alone turn for help.
Guide us (O Lord) to the path that is straight,

rows.arabic: صِرَٰطَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَنْعَمْتَ عَلَيْهِمْ غَيْرِ ٱلْمَغْضُوبِ عَلَيْهِمْ وَلَا ٱلضَّآلِّينَ
rows.translation: The path of those You have blessed, Not of those who have earned Your anger, nor those who have gone astray.
rows.transliteration: ṣirāṭal ladhīna an`amta `alayhim ghayril maghḍūbi `alayhim walaḍ ḍāllīn
